00043 class abstract_knob_c
00044 {
00045   public:
00049     abstract_knob_c() {  }
00050 
00057     abstract_knob_c(string name, string value, string parentName): m_name(name),
00058     m_valueString(value), m_parentName(parentName), m_valueProvided(false) {  }
00059 
00063     inline string getName() const { return m_name; }
00064 
00068     inline string getValueString() const { return m_valueString; }
00069 
00073     inline void setName(const string& name) { m_name = name; m_valueProvided = true; }
00074 
00078     inline void setValueString(const string& value)
00079     {
00080       m_valueString = value; 
00081       m_valueProvided = true;
00082     }
00083 
00087     inline string getParentName() const {return m_parentName;}
00088 
00092     virtual void initFromString(const string& strVal) = 0;
00093 
00097     virtual void display(ostream& os)
00098     {
00099       os << m_name << "   =   " << m_valueString;
00100     }
00101 
00105     bool wasValueProvided() { return m_valueProvided;}
00106 
00107   protected:
00108     string m_name; 
00109     string m_valueString; 
00110     string m_parentName; 
00111     bool   m_valueProvided; 
00112 };

00119 template<class T> class KnobTemplate : public abstract_knob_c
00120 {
00121   public:
00125     KnobTemplate():abstract_knob_c() { }
00126 
00133     KnobTemplate(const string& name, const T& val, const string& parentName = ""):
00134       abstract_knob_c(name, "", parentName), m_value(val) { }
00135 
00139     inline KnobTemplate<T>& setValue(const T& val)
00140     {
00141       m_value = val;
00142       m_valueProvided = true;
00143       return (*this);
00144     }
00145 
00149     virtual void initFromString(const string& strVal)
00150     {
00151       stringstream sstr;
00152       sstr << strVal;
00153       T temp_value;
00154       if (sizeof(T) == 1) {
00155         int temp_int;
00156         sstr >> temp_int;
00157         m_value = temp_int;
00158         temp_value = temp_int;
00159       }
00160       else {
00161         sstr >> m_value;
00162       }
00163       m_valueString = strVal;
00164       m_valueProvided = true;
00165     }
00166 
00170     inline const T getValue() const { return m_value; }
00171 
00176     operator T() const { return m_value; }
00177 
00181     virtual void display(ostream& os)
00182     {
00183       os << m_name << "   =   " << m_value;
00184     }
00185 
00189     string GetValueString(void) {return m_valueString;}
00190 
00191   private:
00195     KnobTemplate(const KnobTemplate& rhs);
00196 
00200     const KnobTemplate& operator=(const KnobTemplate& rhs);
00201 
00202   private:
00203     T m_value; 
00205 };

00211 template<> class KnobTemplate<string> : public abstract_knob_c
00212 {
00213   public:
00220     KnobTemplate(const string& name, const string& val, const string& parentName = ""):
00221       abstract_knob_c(name, "", parentName), m_value(val) { }
00222 
00226     inline KnobTemplate<string>& setValue(const string& val)
00227     {
00228       m_value = val;
00229       return (*this);
00230     }
00231 
00235     virtual void initFromString(const string& strVal)
00236     {
00237       m_value = strVal;
00238       m_valueString = strVal;
00239     }
00240 
00244     inline const string getValue()const {return m_value;}
00245 
00249     operator string() const { return m_value; }
00250 
00254     operator bool() const
00255     {
00256       return (m_value.length() != 0);
00257     }
00258 
00262     virtual void display(ostream& os)
00263     {
00264       os << m_name << "   =   " << m_value;
00265     }
00266 
00267   private:
00271     KnobTemplate(const KnobTemplate& rhs);
00272 
00276     const KnobTemplate& operator=(const KnobTemplate& rhs);
00277 
00278   private:
00279     string m_value; 
00281 };

00329 struct ltstr_s
00330 {
00334   bool operator()(const string& s1, const string& s2) const
00335   {
00336     return (s1 < s2);
00337   }

00397 
00401     friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, KnobsContainer& container)
00402     {
00403       auto iter = container.m_theKnobs.begin();
00404       auto end = container.m_theKnobs.end();
00405       abstract_knob_c* pKnob = NULL;
00406       while (iter != end) {
00407         pKnob = iter->second;
00408         if (pKnob) {
00409           pKnob->display(os);
00410           os << endl;
00411         }
00412         ++iter;
00413       }
00414       return os;
00415     }
00416 
00417   private:
00421     void createEntryFromtext(const string& text);
00422     
00426     void applyValuesToKnobs(map<string, string, ltstr_s>& ValuesMap);
00427 
00428   private:

00430     all_knobs_c *m_allKnobs;
